{"id":435655934,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1609183423,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/435655934/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"8.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        string S[numRows];\n        int cntr = 0, cnt, n = s.size();\n        for(int i = 0; i < numRows; i++)S[i] = \"\";\n        for(int i = 1;cntr < n ; i++){\n            \n            if(i%2){\n                cnt = 0;\n                while(cntr < n and cnt < numRows){\n                    S[cnt++]+=s[cntr++];\n                    //cout<<s[cntr-1]<<\" \";\n                }\n               // cout<<endl;\n            }\n            else{\n                    cnt = numRows - 2;\n                    while(cntr < n and cnt >= 1){\n                         S[cnt--]+=s[cntr++];\n                        //cout<<s[cntr-1]<<\" \";\n                     }\n               // cout<<endl;\n                }\n        }\n        s =\"\";\n        for(int i = 0; i < numRows; i++) s+=S[i];\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
